chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Data: Type
nodes: seq nat
serialize: Data -> seq nat
deserialize: seq nat -> Data
ds_inverse: left_inverse serialize deserialize
q: (seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) * seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType))%type
from: nid
rid: nat
tag: nat

Goal:
uniq q.1 -> uniq q.2 -> uniq (receive_step_fun q from tag rid).1 /\ uniq (receive_step_fun q from tag rid).2

Premises:
left_inverse = fun (A B : Type) (op : A -> B) (inv : B -> A) => forall x : A, inv (op x) = x : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> (B -> A) -> Prop Arguments left_inverse {A B}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
prod_eqType = fun T1 T2 : eqType => EqType (T1 * T2) (prod_eqMixin T1 T2) : eqType -> eqType -> eqType
nid = nat : Set
Notation seq := list
receive_step_fun = fun (q : qstate) (from : nid) (tag rid : nat) => let '(xs, ys) := q in if (tag == treq) && ((from, rid) \notin ys) then (xs, (from, rid) :: ys) else if (tag == tresp) && ((from, rid) \in xs) then (seq.rem (from, rid) xs, ys) else q : qstate -> nid -> nat -> nat -> reqs * seq (nid * nat) Arguments receive_step_fun _ _ (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
send_step_uniq : forall (q : seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) * seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType)) (to : nid) (tag rid : nat), uniq q.1 -> uniq q.2 -> uniq (send_step_fun q to tag rid).1 /\ uniq (send_step_fun q to tag rid).2
Tagged : forall T_ : ?I -> Type, T_ ?i -> {x0 : ?I & T_ x0} where ?I : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize q : seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) * seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) from : nid tag : nat rid : nat |- Type] ?i : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize q : seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) * seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) from : nid tag : nat rid : nat |- ?I]
tagged : forall w : {x : ?I & ?T_ x}, ?T_ (ssrfun.tag w) where ?I : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize q : seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) * seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) from : nid tag : nat rid : nat |- Type] ?T_ : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize q : seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) * seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) from : nid tag : nat rid : nat |- ?I -> Type]
Deprecation.hide : forall u : unit -> unit -> unit, Deprecation.exposed ?T u -> Deprecation.hidden ?T where ?T : [Data : Type nodes : seq nat serialize : Data -> seq nat deserialize : seq nat -> Data ds_inverse : left_inverse serialize deserialize q : seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) * seq (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) from : nid tag : nat rid : nat |- Type]
localCoh = fun=> [Pred h | exists s : qstate, h = st : -> s /\ uniq s.1 && uniq s.2] : nid -> Pred heap
remove_elem = fix remove_elem (xs : seq (nat * nat * seq nat)) (e : prod_eqType (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) (seq_eqType nat_eqType)) {struct xs} : seq (nat * nat * seq nat) := match xs with | [::] => [::] | x :: xs0 => if x == e then xs0 else x :: remove_elem xs0 e end : seq (nat * nat * seq nat) -> prod_eqType (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) (seq_eqType nat_eqType) -> seq (nat * nat * seq nat) Arguments remove_elem _%seq_scope
rem_uniq : forall (T : eqType) (x : T) (s : seq T), uniq s -> uniq (seq.rem x s)
remove_elem_all : forall (xs : seq (nat * nat * seq nat)) (p : pred (nat * nat * seq nat)) (e : prod_eqType (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) (seq_eqType nat_eqType)), all p xs -> all p (remove_elem xs e)
allpairs_uniq : forall (S T R : eqType) (f : S -> T -> R) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), let st := [seq (x, y) | x <- s, y <- t] in uniq s -> uniq t -> {in st &, injective (prod_curry f)} -> uniq [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t]
map_inj_in_uniq : forall (T1 T2 : eqType) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), {in s &, injective f} -> uniq [seq f i | i <- s] = uniq s
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
allpairs_uniq_dep : forall (S : eqType) (T : S -> eqType) (R : eqType) (f : forall x : S, T x -> R) (s : seq S) (t : forall x : S, seq (T x)), let st := [seq Tagged (fun x0 : S => T x0) y | x <- s, y <- t x] in let g := fun p : {x : S & T x} => f (ssrfun.tag p) (tagged p) in uniq s -> {in s, forall x : S, uniq (t x)} -> {in st &, injective g} -> uniq [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t x]
send_step_fun = fun (q : qstate) (to : nid) (tag rid : nat) => let '(xs, ys) := q in if tag == treq then ((to, fresh_id xs) :: xs, ys) else if (tag == tresp) && ((to, rid) \in ys) then (xs, seq.rem (to, rid) ys) else q : qstate -> nid -> nat -> nat -> qstate Arguments send_step_fun _ _ (_ _)%nat_scope
remove_elem_in : forall (xs : seq_predType (prod_eqType (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) (seq_eqType nat_eqType))) (e : prod_eqType (prod_eqType nat_eqType nat_eqType) (seq_eqType nat_eqType)), if e \in xs then perm_eq (e :: remove_elem xs e) xs = true else remove_elem xs e = xs
choice.GenTree.decode_step : forall T : Type, nat + T -> seq (choice.GenTree.tree T) * seq (seq (choice.GenTree.tree T)) -> seq (choice.GenTree.tree T) * seq (seq (choice.GenTree.tree T))
tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
Actions.tryrecv_action_wrapper : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> Actions.action W (option (nid * nat * seq nat)) this
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_total : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s : state), Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s -> exists (s' : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s s' r
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
Actions.tryrecv_act_step_sem : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)), (forall (l : Label) (n : nid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat), filter l n t m -> l \in dom W) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.tryrecv_act_safe W s1 -> forall (s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)), Actions.tryrecv_act_step W this filter s1 s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub = fix pos_sub (x y : BinNums.positive) {struct y} : BinNums.Z := match x with | BinNums.xI p => match y with | BinNums.xI q => BinIntDef.Z.double (pos_sub p q) | BinNums.xO q => BinIntDef.Z.succ_double (pos_sub p q) | BinNums.xH => BinNums.Zpos (BinNums.xO p) end | BinNums.xO p => match y with | BinNums.xI q => BinIntDef.Z.pred_double (pos_sub p q) | BinNums.xO q => BinIntDef.Z.double (pos_sub p q) | BinNums.xH => BinNums.Zpos (BinPos.Pos.pred_double p) end | BinNums.xH => match y with | BinNums.xI q => BinNums.Zneg (BinNums.xO q) | BinNums.xO q => BinNums.Zneg (BinPos.Pos.pred_double q) | BinNums.xH =>...
List.nth : forall A : Type, nat -> seq A -> A -> A
fresh_id = fun xs : seq (nid * nat) => (last 0 (sort oleq (unzip2 xs))).+1 : seq (nid * nat) -> nat Arguments fresh_id _%seq_scope
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
choice.GenTree.Node : forall T : Type, nat -> seq (choice.GenTree.tree T) -> choice.GenTree.tree T
List.split : forall A B : Type, seq (A * B) -> seq A * seq B
Ring_polynom.PNSubst1 : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> C * Ring_polynom.Mon -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> nat -> Ring_polynom.Pol C
Ring_polynom.PNSubst : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> C * Ring_polynom.Mon -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> nat -> option (Ring_polynom.Pol C)
tally : forall T : eqType, seq T -> seq (T * nat)
tally_seq : forall T : eqType, seq (T * nat) -> seq T
flatten = fun T : Type => foldr cat [::] : forall T : Type, seq (seq T) -> seq T Arguments flatten {T}%type_scope _%seq_scope
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
perm_flatten : forall (T : eqType) (ss1 ss2 : seq (seq T)), perm_eq ss1 ss2 -> perm_eq (flatten ss1) (flatten ss2)
zip_in2 : forall (A B : eqType) (a : A) (b : B) (xs : seq_predType (prod_eqType A B)), (a, b) \in xs -> b \in unzip2 xs
Ring_polynom.Mphi : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> seq R -> Ring_polynom.Mon -> R
seq.rem : forall T : eqType, T -> seq T -> seq T
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Ring_polynom.Pphi : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> seq R -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> R
Inductive tree (T : Type) : Type := Leaf : T -> choice.GenTree.tree T | Node : nat -> seq (choice.GenTree.tree T) -> choice.GenTree.tree T Arguments choice.GenTree.tree _%type_scope Arguments choice.GenTree.Leaf [T]%type_scope Arguments choice.GenTree.Node [T]%type_scope _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
nseq = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) => (ncons n)^~ [::] : forall T : Type, nat -> T -> seq T Arguments nseq {T}%type_scope _%nat_scope

```  
intros.
unfold receive_step_fun.
unfold uniq.
intros.
destruct q as [xs ys].
split.
- destruct (tag == treq) eqn:tag_req.
  + simpl. apply rem_uniq. apply send_step_uniq.
  + destruct (tag == tresp) eqn:tag_resp.
    * apply send_step_uniq.
    * simpl. apply send_step_uniq.
- destruct (tag == treq) eqn:tag_req.
  + apply send_step_uniq.
  + destruct (tag == tresp) eqn:tag_resp.
    * simpl. apply rem_uniq. apply send_step_uniq.
    * apply send_step_uniq.
```

original: intros. unfold receive_step_fun. unfold uniq. intros. destruct q as [xs ys]. split. - destruct (tag == treq) eqn:tag_req. + simpl. apply rem_uniq. apply send_step_uniq. + destruct (tag == tresp) eqn:tag_resp. * apply send_step_uniq. * simpl. apply send_step_uniq. - destruct (tag == treq) eqn:tag_req. + apply send_step_uniq. + destruct (tag == tresp) eqn:tag_resp. * simpl. apply rem_uniq. apply send_step_uniq. * apply send_step_uniq.
